Activity: Log in, check emails, and review progress. Review the draft test plan for UI user testing.
Finalize the user testing plan and schedule a testing session with @qtest-1. Define the testing objectives, tasks, and metrics for evaluating the UI.
Create interactive prototypes for the main menu and inventory screens using Figma's prototyping tools.

Analyze the user testing feedback and identify key usability issues and areas for improvement. Document the findings and prioritize changes.
Based on the feedback, iterate on the main menu and inventory screen mockups and prototypes.
Document the changes made based on user feedback and plan for tomorrow's tasks. Start working on mockups for the settings screen.
